questions.question: Where does Santa Clause live?
questions.d: Same Place as Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer

questions.question: How many licks does it take to get to the tootsie roll center of a Tootsie Roll Lollipop?
questions.c: I don't know, let me see, 'one... two... three.... crunch! easy, it's three

questions.question: If a tree falls in the forest and there is no one there to hear it, does it make a sound?
questions.a: Yes of course there is a repurcussion(Classical Physics)
questions.c: There is no tree, only forest..., there is no forest... (Zen}
questions.d: It is not possible that it is not heard (Quantum Entanglement+Diamond Sutra)

questions.question: What is a thneed?
questions.a: A fine something of athing that everyone needs!
questions.b: Oncelers ingenious product of the trufula trees
questions.c: An amorphic sweater-like thing that can be used as a sock, a hat, a carpet, a pillow, or a sheet

questions.question: Are you pondering what I am pondering, Pinky?
questions.a: I think so Brain, but don't you think Mr. Hoover would notice a missing evening gown?
questions.b: I think so Brain, but me and Pippi longstocking? just think of the children.
questions.c: I think so, Brain. But if I put on two tutu's, would I really be wearing a four-by-four?
questions.d: The answer is always really 'no, not really'.
